name: KcPay
description: The KcPay platform marks a major advancement in the fintech sector, providing a comprehensive blockchain solution. The core of the platform is the integration of cutting-edge artificial intelligence and blockchain technology, aiming to bring users a safe and efficient digital asset management experience. Through encrypted face recognition WEB3 technology, this breakthrough technology combines the non-tampering characteristics of biometric technology and blockchain to provide new guarantees for user asset security.
